UniprotID	O95639-2
Accession	O95639;D6W5S8;Q6FGE6;Q86TF8;Q9BTW6
EntryName	CPSF4_HUMAN
ProteinName	Cleavage and polyadenylation specificity factor subunit 4 (Cleavage and polyadenylation specificity factor 30 kDa subunit) (CPSF 30 kDa subunit) (NS1 effector domain-binding protein 1) (Neb-1) (No arches homolog)
GeneName	CPSF4 CPSF30 NAR NEB1
Length	244
Function	Component of the cleavage and polyadenylation specificity factor (CPSF) complex that play a key role in pre-mRNA 3'-end formation, recognizing the AAUAAA signal sequence and interacting with poly(A) polymerase and other factors to bring about cleavage and poly(A) addition. CPSF4 binds RNA polymers with a preference for poly(U).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
Disorder	
ExposeBuried	
SurfaceAccessbility

Hydropathy
